message.content:
We need to isolate and sum the amounts from the transaction rows whose type indicates that they are “Fixed Assets Purchase.” In our list there are two such rows (the “Initial” entry that shows an opening “Fixed Assets” amount is not a purchase but the opening balance):

• The first fixed‑asset purchase row is the one with id “FixedAsset20231231001” having type “Fixed Assets Purchase” and an amount of 928991.43.
• The second fixed‑asset purchase row is also with id “FixedAsset20231231001” (but later in the file) with an amount of 1567146.49.

When we add these two amounts:
  928991.43 + 1567146.49 = 2496137.92

Thus the final purchase of fixed assets is 2496137.92.

Below is the answer in the required JSON format.

```json
{"solution": {"Purchase of Fixed Assets": "2496137.92"}}
```
